title: The Last Day to Order Radavist Merch for Christmas Delivery is December 16th!
content:
If youâ€™re looking to gift some of our Winter Merch this year for the holidays, your last opportunity to buy some with a Christmas delivery is the end of the day, Monday, December 16th. As always, we thank you for your support! Every cent from our merch sales goes to running this website and paying our authors.

Check out the full merch drop at The Radavist Webshop.

The post The Last Day to Order Radavist Merch for Christmas Delivery is December 16th! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
